preface.title: Preface
preface.para: The Spring Data Graph project, as part of the Spring Data initiative, aims to simplify development with graph databases. Like JPA, it uses annotations on simple POJO beans. The annotations activate the AspectJ aspects in the Spring Data Graph framework, mapping the POJO entities and their fields to nodes, relationships, and properties in the graph database.

To get started with a simple application, only the basic annotations (see ) and the additional aspect-introduced entity methods (see ) are required. Basic knowledge of graph stores is needed to access advanced functionality like traversals.
